verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For He's able just to carry you through
No matter, No matter
What the world may do
Try Jesus - Try Jesus
'cause He satisfies
He's waiting - He's waiting
just to hear your cry
Trust in Him- Trust in Him
In everything that you do
For He- For He will bear the load for you
For He's able-able-able-able
Able to carry you through
